tweet: If the Apple store bans Parler, don't abandon it, just encourage new users to download it as a website to their phone homescreen.  Would still function pretty much the same.

It’s time we crowdfund Our own social media platform owned by the people  for the people and anyone else that is open to freedom of speech without been censored regardless if you on the left or the right if we don’t act now it may be too late in the future.
